name: part_009
file: tmp_【3D Debut】Watch the way I move~ #3DemonDebut #holoadvent [2Nob6f5dy7c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: End of performance of "Kirari" by Fujii Kaze, covered by Nerissa, Marine and Calliope.
MC section after the song where the three singers talk to the audience and each other.
Nerissa introduces her final solo song in a recording studio setting.
Performance of Nerissa's original song "In My Feelings".

subtitles.original: ...と未来とも
subtitles.english: ...and the future.

subtitles.original: 出逢いとも
subtitles.english: Meeting with people.

subtitles.original: 言えば 握手とも
subtitles.english: Or a handshake.

subtitles.original: ああ 惹かれてたけれど
subtitles.english: Ah, I was drawn to it, but

subtitles.original: 全ては夢みたい
subtitles.english: Everything seems like a dream.

subtitles.original: あれもこれも
subtitles.english: That and this,

subtitles.original: 魅力的でも
subtitles.english: though they are attractive,

subtitles.original: 私は君がいい
subtitles.english: it's you that I want.

subtitles.original: どこにいたの 探していたよ
subtitles.english: Where were you? I was looking for you.

subtitles.original: 連れてって 連れてって
subtitles.english: Take me away, take me away.

subtitles.original: 何もかも捨ててくよ
subtitles.english: I'll leave everything behind.

subtitles.original: どこまでも どこまでも
subtitles.english: Anywhere at all, anywhere at all.

subtitles.original: 荒れ狂う季節の中も
subtitles.english: Through the raging seasons,

subtitles.original: 群衆の中も
subtitles.english: and through the crowds,

subtitles.original: 君となら さらり さらり
subtitles.english: with you, smoothly and easily.

subtitles.original: 新しい日々も 拙い過去も
subtitles.english: New days and a clumsy past,

subtitles.original: 全てが きらり
subtitles.english: it all sparkles.

subtitles.original: Ah, yeah!
subtitles.english: Ah, yeah!

subtitles.original: Thank you guys!
subtitles.english: Thank you guys!

subtitles.original: Thank you so much for coming out.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for coming out.

subtitles.original: That was so fun!
subtitles.english: That was so fun!

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Oh my god!

subtitles.original: 大好き チュチュチュ！
subtitles.english: I love you! Mwah mwah mwah!

subtitles.original: Wow, it's getting hot in here. Calli, thank you for coming too!
subtitles.english: Wow, it's getting hot in here. Calli, thank you for coming too!

subtitles.original: Yeah, no problem. I'm happy to be here. Congrats on 3D!
subtitles.english: Yeah, no problem. I'm happy to be here. Congrats on 3D!

subtitles.original: Thank you! It made it so special to have you two as guests...
subtitles.english: Thank you! It made it so special to have you two as guests...

subtitles.original: ...and to get to sing with you two. That's crazy!
subtitles.english: ...and to get to sing with you two. That's crazy!

subtitles.original: But we still have one more song after this one.
subtitles.english: But we still have one more song after this one.

subtitles.original: Not all of us, just me, sadly.
subtitles.english: Not all of us, just me, sadly.

subtitles.original: We have to say goodbye to these lovely ladies.
subtitles.english: We have to say goodbye to these lovely ladies.

subtitles.original: But the Jailbird Tech have to set it up...
subtitles.english: But the Jailbird Tech have to set it up...

subtitles.original: ...so we're going to say goodbye for a few seconds...
subtitles.english: ...so we're going to say goodbye for a few seconds...

subtitles.original: ...and I'll be right back.
subtitles.english: ...and I'll be right back.

subtitles.original: Let's go!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Bye bye!
subtitles.english: Bye bye!

subtitles.original: So, this last song for today is actually going to be...
subtitles.english: So, this last song for today is actually going to be...

subtitles.original: ...the titular track of my new EP, "In My Feelings".
subtitles.english: ...the titular track of my new EP, "In My Feelings".

subtitles.original: Song is the same name.
subtitles.english: Song is the same name.

subtitles.original: I really worked hard on this song. I think it came out great.
subtitles.english: I really worked hard on this song. I think it came out great.

subtitles.original: So, I hope you guys will enjoy listening to...
subtitles.english: So, I hope you guys will enjoy listening to...

subtitles.original: ...my first live performance of it.
subtitles.english: ...my first live performance of it.

subtitles.original: それでは聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Please listen.

subtitles.original: Can't believe the words that came out of your mouth
subtitles.english: Can't believe the words that came out of your mouth

subtitles.original: Never thought that what we have would go this route
subtitles.english: Never thought that what we have would go this route

subtitles.original: Can see the clock is ticking
subtitles.english: Can see the clock is ticking

subtitles.original: But I just can't stop thinking
subtitles.english: But I just can't stop thinking

subtitles.original: Every little memory's tormenting me
subtitles.english: Every little memory's tormenting me

subtitles.original: Counting all of my mistakes
subtitles.english: Counting all of my mistakes

subtitles.original: Want to sleep but it won't happen
subtitles.english: Want to sleep but it won't happen

subtitles.original: Waiting for the day to break
subtitles.english: Waiting for the day to break

subtitles.original: I'm wide awake reliving the past and
subtitles.english: I'm wide awake reliving the past and

subtitles.original: Still haunted by the ghost of you
subtitles.english: Still haunted by the ghost of you

subtitles.original: Everywhere I look it's like you're always there
subtitles.english: Everywhere I look it's like you're always there

subtitles.original: Despite the fact that I'm on my own
subtitles.english: Despite the fact that I'm on my own

subtitles.original: I'm in my feelings, like rain fall on the ground
subtitles.english: I'm in my feelings, like rain fall on the ground

subtitles.original: They're soaking through the sheets and drenching every single inch of me
subtitles.english: They're soaking through the sheets and drenching every single inch of me

subtitles.original: I'm in my feelings, it's falling all around
subtitles.english: I'm in my feelings, it's falling all around

subtitles.original: Inside this never-ending downpour there's no escape to oh far
subtitles.english: Inside this never-ending downpour there's no escape to oh far

subtitles.original: Thinking about the night you left and you lied
subtitles.english: Thinking about the night you left and you lied

subtitles.original: That morning I had woken, my heart that froze and broken
subtitles.english: That morning I had woken, my heart that froze and broken

subtitles.original: Feeling like I could drown in the tears I cried
subtitles.english: Feeling like I could drown in the tears I cried

subtitles.original: Sinking down into the blue
subtitles.english: Sinking down into the blue

subtitles.original: Like I'm submerged in water
subtitles.english: Like I'm submerged in water

subtitles.original: Chills straight down to the bone
subtitles.english: Chills straight down to the bone

subtitles.original: Struggling to breathe just thinking about it
subtitles.english: Struggling to breathe just thinking about it

subtitles.original: Still haunted by the ghost of you
subtitles.english: Still haunted by the ghost of you

subtitles.original: Everywhere I look it's like you're always there
subtitles.english: Everywhere I look it's like you're always there

subtitles.original: Despite the fact you left me alone
subtitles.english: Despite the fact you left me alone

subtitles.original: I'm in my feelings, like rain fall on the ground
subtitles.english: I'm in my feelings, like rain fall on the ground

subtitles.original: They're soaking through the sheets and drenching every single inch of me
subtitles.english: They're soaking through the sheets and drenching every single inch of me

subtitles.original: I'm in my feelings, it's falling all around
subtitles.english: I'm in my feelings, it's falling all around

subtitles.original: Inside this never-ending downpour there's no escape to oh far
subtitles.english: Inside this never-ending downpour there's no escape to oh far

subtitles.original: Who you're seeing
subtitles.english: Who you're seeing

subtitles.original: What you're doing
subtitles.english: What you're doing

subtitles.original: Where you're going
subtitles.english: Where you're going

subtitles.original: I don't want to know
subtitles.english: I don't want to know

subtitles.original: Why you're coming back, I don't...
subtitles.english: Why you're coming back, I don't...

subtitles.original: Don't need you to call me
subtitles.english: Don't need you to call me

subtitles.original: Don't need you to love me
subtitles.english: Don't need you to love me
